trans-unit.source: A WindowsFormsHost cannot be rotated. To suppress this error, handle the LayoutError event and set ThrowException to false.
trans-unit.target: A WindowsFormsHost cannot be rotated. To suppress this error, handle the LayoutError event and set ThrowException to false.

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: The child control cannot be a top-level form.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when applying a property map. For details, see the inner exception.
